overview: Hwa-Jeong, a girl of red light street, ends up flowing into Miari Texas. She came to know Cheol-Min, a settler, and feels ardent love toward him. One day she is informed that her life is limited due to cerebral tumor. She yields her love to one of other prostitutes who loves Cheol-Min onsidedly and determines to go Hong Kong as show technician through a black organization. Enraged Cheol-Min resists against the black organization but rather he is caught and becomes blind. Hwa-Jeong transplants her eyes to him and leaves lonely trip to meet the gradually coming death.
title: Miari Texas
